title: Runtime Strain
description: A runtime strain is a combination of code and content that enables the creation of a digital experience.

static.description: Pointer to the repository for static resources

directoryIndex.description:
Name of the resource to use for requests to directories (no extension).
When a request is made by the browser to `/help` and `directoryIndex=README.html`, then the request will be treated as if it was made to `/help/README.html`. Slashes (`/`) are not allowed in the directory index.

sticky.description: Sticky strains are not re-evaluated on every request. As soon as a visitor is determined to match a sticky strain, a session cookie will be set to keep the user in the strain.

oneOf.description: Name of the action package that renders this strain.

A pair of OpenWhisk namespace and package name, separated by slash.

 This will be the base package to look up actions to run in this strain.
A base URL to use for all actions in this strain.

url.description:
URL condition.

**Warning**: this property has been deprecated in favour of adding the `url` to the `condition` property.

urls.description: List of known URLs for testing this strain

condition.description: VLC condition that controls that can optionally activate this strain.

params.description: A list (using globbing language) of accepted URL parameters. Note: every parameter is a potential cache killer.

redirects.description: The redirect rules that should be applied to this strain
